authors: Frank Hommers and others (Burhan Irmikci (barhun), Zachary Sims(zsims), kgamecarter, Stafford Williams (staff0rd), briangweber, Viktor Svyatokha (ahydrax), Christopher Dresel (Dresel), Ben Herila (bherila), Vytautas Kasparavičius (vytautask)
title: Hangfire PostgreSql Storage
description: PostgreSql storage implementation for Hangfire (background job system for ASP.NET applications).

packOptions.summary: Latest build of Hangfire.PostgreSql with many fixes and new PostgreSql driver support.
